refnamediv.refpurpose: Load a netcdf file into the WDB database.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: netcdfLoad loads the contents of the given netcdf file into the wdb database. The database must be up and running for this program to work, unless one of the options --help or --list have been given on the command line.

refsect1.title: Options
refsect1.para: Run netcdfLoad --help to see a list of allowed options. Note that the --list option does not work.

refsect1.title: Exit Status
refsect1.para: netcdfLoad returns 0 to the shell if it finished normally and 1 if a fatal error occured during loading (out of memory, files not found, database not found, etc.). Note that not being able to load a field is not considered a fatal error; in such cases, netcdfLoad simply logs a warning or error to the log and tries to load the next field.
